text: 13.55 Part 5 of this policy seeks to encourage retrofit of existing buildings. New buildings make up only a small percentage of the borough, and to achieve Tower Hamletsâ€™ zero carbon aspirations existing buildings will need to undergo retrofit to improve energy efficiency, thermal efficiency, and end reliance on fossil fuels. 13.56 Best practice retrofit can bring multiple social, environmental, and economic benefits, such as reducing energy bills, improving comfort, and supporting national decarbonization efforts. However, a poor or 118 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO POLICIES piecemeal retrofit can miss the opportunity to maximise environmental benefits, and result in need for further retrofit works in the future. Poorly considered retrofitting interventions can even have a negative impact; for example, it is crucial that improvements attempting to enhance energy and carbon performance of homes do not worsen the risk of overheating.
